fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Silence someone each night, preventing them from talking, voting, or using day abilities the next day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - As long as you are alive, anything that would be announced to the public is instead announced only to you. This includes votes, dead players, their roles, etc.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the Town lose the game.
